miic.core.miic_utils.create_panel¶

create_panel(df_list, df_names)[source]¶

Create a Panel given a list of DataFrame and a list of names

This function creates a Panel putting together a list of DataFrame contained in the df_list’ argument and assigning to each one of them a name according to the list `df_names (df_list[i] -> df_names[i]).

Parameters:
  • df_list (list of DataFrame) – List of DataFrames to combine on a single Panel
  • df_names (list of strings) – List of names to assign to the DataFrames
Return type:

Panel
Returns:

dp: Panel - dp[name] = df name where name=df_names[i] and df = df_list[i]
